nodes.text: Star Wars: The Mandalorian: Guide to Season One

Star Wars: The Mandalorian: Guide to Season One (originally titled The Making of Star Wars: The Mandalorian Season One) is a book published by Titan Comics that chronicles the making of the first season of the Disney+ series The Mandalorian. It was published on May 18, 2021.
A book dedicated to the first season of the successful hit live action series The Mandalorian, streaming on Disney+, featuring character files, plots, settings, and behind-the-scenes content.
An in-depth look at the making of the hit show, exploring the adventures of the Mandalorian and the Child. This title features in-depth with rare images.
